original_text: All his transgressions that he hath committed, they shall not be mentioned unto him: in his righteousness that he hath done he shall live.
korean_text: 그 범죄한 것이 하나도 기억함이 되지 아니하리니 그가 행한 공의로 살리라

sentences.original_text: All his transgressions that he hath committed
they shall not be mentioned unto him
in his righteousness that he hath done
